title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: Flour, Sugar, Cocoa Powder, Baking Powder, Eggs, Milk, Vegetable Oil, Vanilla Extract
instructions: Preheat oven to 350F. Mix dry ingredients. Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla. Bake for 30 minutes.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Spaghetti, Eggs, Parmesan Cheese, Pancetta, Black Pepper
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all with pepper.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: Broccoli, Carrot, Bell Peppers, Soy Sauce, Garlic, Ginger, Vegetable Oil
instructions: Stir fry vegetables. Add soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: Chicken, Onions, Tomatoes, Curry Powder, Coconut Milk
instructions: Fry onions, add chicken. Add tomatoes and curry powder. Pour in coconut milk and simmer.

title: Beef Tacos
ingredients: Ground Beef, Taco Seasoning, Tortillas, Lettuce, Tomato, Cheese
instructions: Cook beef with seasoning. Serve on tortillas with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
